item.title: Windows 7 Revealed
item.description: InformationWeek previews Windows 7, the successor to Vista, with 24 screenshots from a demo given by Julie Larson Green, Microsoft's vice president for Windows experience. Read more about Windows 7 in the InformationWeek article. http://www.informationweek.com/galleries/showImage.jhtml?galleryID=268&imageID=1&articleID=211601289
